report.title: Report
report.subtitle: Why are you reporting this?

OFF_TOPIC.label: Off Topic
OFF_TOPIC.description: Content that is not related to studying or the main topic

SPAM.label: Spam
SPAM.description: Advertising, promotion, or repetitive meaningless content

HARASSMENT.label: Harassment
HARASSMENT.description: Harassment or defamation targeting specific individuals

HATE_SPEECH.label: Hate Speech
HATE_SPEECH.description: Discrimination or hateful expressions towards specific groups

MISINFORMATION.label: Misinformation
MISINFORMATION.description: Content that intentionally spreads false information

COPYRIGHT.label: Copyright Violation
COPYRIGHT.description: Content using others' work without permission

OTHER.label: Other
OTHER.description: Other reasons not covered by the above categories

funCategoryAlert.title: This is Fun Content
funCategoryAlert.message:
This content is for break time.

The Fun category allows entertainment content unrelated to studying, and is intentionally provided to reduce learning fatigue.

Reporting just because it's off-topic may be dismissed after review.

Do you still want to report?
